response.original_title: Wet Nets With Matt Hayes: Disc 2
response.overview: Join legendary angler Matt Hayes and his fishing companion Mick Brown as they embark on an action-packed tour of some of Europe's premier fishing locations in Wet Nets. As one of the country's most popular fishermen, there isn't much Matt Hayes doesn't know about his sport and this series shows him at his very best.  From catching carp in the Midlands, to fishing for barbel on the River Windrush and looking for zander on the Avon, join Matt and Mick as they travel from location to location, from river to lake, on the fishing trip of a lifetime. Along the way Matt shares hints and tips on how to catch the biggest specimens, so next time you are out on a river or lake you too can catch some of Britain's most popular fish.
response.title: Wet Nets With Matt Hayes: Disc 2
